overview: The film shows the creative process between a director and an actress while they prepare the assembly of a play called "Rabbit". In an environment of isolation and demanding rehearsals, two stories are told: the everyday one and the work of assembling the character. Both stories are full of psychological abuse and mistreatment by the director, who will bring out her deepest desires from the actress in order to merge into the character she represents: the rabbit. "Rabbit" is an experiment between the everyday and the theatrical that plays with the psychology of the viewer and its characters.
title: Conejo
